NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: Research on this plane of <color=orange>Bramble Island</color> is proving.. difficult. The tides here seem keen to submerge my vessel as I attempt to explore. I must seek higher ground as soon as...
2
1
CASSAVA: Of immediate priority: <color=orange>Deadly matter</color> was observed by third eye <color=orange>dissipating briefly</color> in contact with water!
3
2
CASSAVA: This is a very noteworthy discovery: <color=orange>The passing tide neutralizes the matter as it rises from time to time!</color> I must be patient, and study what happens when <color=orange> matter is plunged deep into the ocean by a cyclone's visit!</color>
GM_R2 2
GM_EX2 2
